projectDesc.p: "陳王猷子妇" is part of The Global Medieval Sourcebook, a digital compendium of medieval texts in their original languages and in English translation. This larger project comprises computer-readable transcriptions and/or editions of texts dating from the ninth to the sixteenth century, and originating in Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia; accompanied by new English translations; high-resolution digital images of manuscript/early print sources, where available; an apparatus that includes critical introductions, textual notes and annotations; and a flexible user interface with which to navigate these materials.

editorialDecl.p: Transcriptions and translations are encoded in XML conforming to TEI (P5) guidelines. The original-language text is contained within <lem> tags and translations within <rdg> tags.

interpretation.p: Texts are translated into modern English with maximum fidelity to the original text, except where it would impair comprehension or good style. Archaisms are preserved where they do not conflict with the aesthetic of the original text. Creative translation choices are marked and discussed in the critical notes.

app.lem: 潮州人陳王猷為梅州守.
app.rdg: Chen Wangyou from Chaozhou was the magistrate of Meizhou.

app.lem: 子婦死焉, 葬之於郡北山之上.
app.rdg: When his daughter-in-law died, the Chen family buried her in the mountain north of the county.
Every evening, her spirit would come back home to sleep with her husband.
Her husband was scared and slept on his mother’s bed.

app.lem: 婦複來即之, 不可卻,
app.rdg: But the woman came back again and could not be turned away.
Even when she saw the Chen family, she would not avoid them.

app.lem: 一子數歲矣, 韶秀可愛,
app.rdg: Her son was a few years old, cute and good looking.

app.lem: 每欲取以去, 舉家爭而奪之.
app.rdg: Every time she tried to take him away, the entire Chen family would fight to get him back.
However, the woman went in and out of the Chen family like there was no one around.

app.lem: 陳氏甚懼, 乃召道士醮設及禱於神, 皆不能遣.
app.rdg: The Chen family was so scared that they hired a Daoist to set up a religious ceremony and prayed to god in their behalf – neither could dispel the spirit.
At the time, it was the third month of the Shaoxing era.

app.lem: 又三月, 陳守卒於郡.
app.rdg: After three months, the magistrate Chen died in the county.
